name: Order of the Profane Soul
description: Blood hunters who forge pacts with otherworldly patrons, blending hemocraft with warlock magic.

3.name: Otherworldly Patron
3.description: Choose a patron that augments your subclass features.

3.name: Pact Magic
3.description: Gain warlock-style spellcasting using the Profane Soul progression.

3.name: Rite Focus
3.description: While a rite is active, your weapon serves as a spellcasting focus and grants a patron-specific benefit.

7.name: Mystic Frenzy
7.description: After casting a cantrip, make one weapon attack as a bonus action.

7.name: Revealed Arcana
7.description: Your patron grants a distinctive spell you can cast once per rest using a pact slot.

11.name: Brand of the Sapping Scar
11.description: Branded creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against your warlock spells.

15.name: Unsealed Arcana
15.description: Your patron grants an additional spell you can cast once without expending a spell slot per long rest.

18.name: Blood Curse of the Souleater
18.description: You gain the Blood Curse of the Souleater, which doesn't count against your blood curses known.
